Research.Description: Scientists conduct research to explore new discoveries and advancements.
Research is often performed in specialized laboratories equipped with necessary equipment and resources.
Research findings are often published in scientific journals or other publications to share knowledge with the scientific community.
Research projects often require funding from government agencies, private foundations, or other funding agencies.
